item.title: [US][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 12, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Oct 6, 00:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/12/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 12/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

item.title: [GRA/BHS][Public cloud] - End Of Life ML Serving
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 30, 12:00 UTC  -  Dec 1, 12:00 UTC

Aug 18, 09:51 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End time : 01/12/2022 08:00 UTC
Comment : As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of ML Serving services October 4th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (no more new namespaces or models deployed).
We will end the Support of all ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (shutdown of the services and related backups).

Impacted customers will be notified by email about this End-Of-Life process in August (email from NIC Admin)

Perimeter:
- All ML Serving services and solutions (free or paid) worldwide.
- OVHcloud /cloud/project/{serviceName}/ai/serving/* API endpoints

NOT in the perimeter:
- AI Notebooks
- AI Training
- AI Deploy (formerly AI Apps)

Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases AI Deploy.
Migration tutorials will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/publiccloud/ai/

Timeline:
04/10/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

Aug 17, 14:10 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 17, 14:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 15:00 UTC
End time : 01/12/2022 08:00 UTC
Comment : As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of ML Serving services October 4th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (no more new namespaces or models deployed).
We will end the Support of all ML Serving services December 1st 2022 (shutdown of the services and related backups).

Impacted customers will be notified by email about this End-Of-Life process in August (email from NIC Admin)

Perimeter:
- All ML Serving services and solutions (free or paid) worldwide.
- OVHcloud /cloud/project/{serviceName}/ai/serving/* API endpoints

NOT in the perimeter:
- AI Notebooks
- AI Training
- AI Deploy (formerly AI Apps)

Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases AI Deploy.
Migration tutorials will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/publiccloud/ai/

Timeline:
04/10/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
01/12/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.

item.title: [Rbx4][Vrack] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 16, 21:00 - 22:30 UTC

Oct 25, 23:29 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/11/2022 21:00 UTC
End time : 16/11/2022 22:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will upgrade the version one network equipment. It will correct some malfunctions.

item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/UK1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 8, 08:00 UTC  -  Nov 10, 16:00 UTC

Aug 22, 14:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/11/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

item.description:
Nov 5, 21:18 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/11/2022 12:00 UTC
End Time : 05/11/2022 21:00 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue
Service impact : Latency was observed for Object Storage and Cloud Archive
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 5, 20:38 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/11/2022 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Latency is being observed for Object Storage and Cloud Archive
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
